subject: Simsonn handbrake
description_text:
Hello! I was thinking of buying the Simsonn HB Pro handbrake but the
question im asking is that do you ship them from Germany and do i need to
pay like custom duties or any hidden extra costs? I bought sometime ago the
plus x pedals and i am LOVING them so far! Really looking forward to
hearing from you so i can complete my purchase. I am ordering from Finland!
Best regards Eeka.

conversations.body_text: Hi Eeka Poikela,  ​We ship this product from China, but you don't need to pay any additional fees after placing your order.Thank you for your inquiry. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us anytime. We will respond as soon as possible.

why is there additional taxes on the handbrake but not on like plus x
pedals etc?

ma 19. tammik. 2026 klo 5.16 service@simsonn.com

Hi Eeka Poikela,  Specific Tax Rates and Fees VAT rates are based on each country’s policies, typically between 15% and 27%. Customs duty rates depend on product categories and countries.  Please familiarize yourself with your country or region’s customs and tax regulations before placing an order. We recommend consulting local tax authorities or logistics companies in advance to avoid unnecessary delays or additional fees upon package arrival.
